meanings.definition: A type of virus that causes severe hemorrhagic fever in humans and nonhuman primates.
meanings.sent1: The filovirus spread quickly through the community, causing many people to become very sick.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the filovirus to understand how it affects different species.
meanings.sent3: The filovirus decided to take a vacation and ended up causing chaos in the tropical resort.
meanings.sent4: The filovirus was like a silent intruder, creeping into the cells and causing havoc.
meanings.sent5: The filovirus was a ruthless invader, leaving destruction in its wake wherever it went.

meanings.definition: Any member of the Filoviridae family of viruses.
meanings.sent1: The researchers discovered a new filovirus within the Filoviridae family that had unique characteristics.
meanings.sent2: Doctors need to be aware of the different strains of filovirus that can cause outbreaks.
meanings.sent3: The filovirus family reunion was a lively event with viruses from all over the world.
meanings.sent4: Each filovirus in the family had its own personality, making them distinct from one another.
meanings.sent5: The Filoviridae family was like a close-knit community, with each filovirus playing a specific role.
